NewsArticle.Title: Holiday Bonus Event!
NewsArticle.Content: Holiday Bonus Event All registered accounts will receive DOUBLE Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. Registered accounts will also receive DOUBLE the leveling rate of Skills and Spells. Using the leveling bonus item from the itemshop will QUADRUPLE the rate!!! ((This event will begin on December 24th through December 29th. Register your accounts to take advantage of this special event!)) Happy Holidays, Dark Ages Team
